modName: Invisible Helmet for Dynasty Armors and others
descriptionHtml:
Invisible Helmet for Dynasty Armors and other armors. (BETA 0.2)

***Updated - Now contains both heavy and light helmet.

This is an .esp file that creates an invisible helmet. I made this primarily for use with the Dynasty Armors as they have no helmet. I\'m not particularly fond of wearing circlets and wanted something that was enchantable and didn\'t mess up my hair or looks!

This is a beta as I have only done limited testing on this. It /should/ wotk with other races. Briefly tested on other races but never got further than testing via \'showracemenu\'

Features:
-------------
Its Invisible!
Based on the Dragon Plate Helmet it has the same stats
Comes in both heavy and light types
Craftable at a forge
Can be tempered
Can be enchanted
Can be purchased at Belethor\'s General Store in Whiterun
Can be obtained via the console

To obtain via console. Type \'player.additem xxxxxxxx 1\' where xxxxxxxx is the id below.
The XX at the start is the loading order of the mod. If you don\'t know the loading order start at 01 and work up until the item is added. Note the loading order is base 16 (hex) so goes in this order: 00-09 0a-0f 10-19 1a-1f and so on.

XX0033a0 - Invisible Helmet Heavy
XX0033a1 - Invisible Helmet Light


Installation:
----------------
Simply drop the .esp in your skyrim\\data folder.


Uninstallation:
----------------
Simply remove the .esp from your skyrim\\data folder.


Change Log:
-----------------
0.1 - Initial release.
0.2 - Added light helmet. Renamed both to \'heavy\' and \'light\'


Credits:
-----------
None really as this is my own creation, but would still like to thank all modders out there. Without your mods I wouldn\'t have had the opportunity to pull them apart and see how they work :-)


Permissions:
-----------------
Do what you like with it. Feel free to mod it and do whatever you like with it. There are no restrictions with this file whatsoever. I do not require credit for this, but it would be nice if you did credit me if you use this for any other mods.
author: Simomax
